name: 要/Pursuit II
description:
Hello, this is Moremore! This time, I have created a Virtual Reality immersive experience that discusses the concept of "pursuit". This piece is the part-2 for the concept. Part-1 is a video piece. 

For me, I believe that the more I want something, the less likely I can get it. However, if I remain static and be focusing on myself, things I want would come to me. ABOVE IS A SPOILER TO WIN THE GAME LOL. I hope this short but concise piece could bring you something to think about. 

I developed this experience with Oculus Quest 2, Oculus Link, and Steam VR. I believe you would be able to enjoy if all the apps and cables are properly set up. Even though I used Oculus Quest 2, other headsets would work as well. Final reminder: just make sure steam VR is running and recognizing your headset!

If you are interested in my process or more of my work, feel free to follow my instagram. Thank you very much!

要/Pursuit II - 2022.3
Format: Virtual Reality Interactive Experience

Supervised and inspired by Jonathan William Turner.

Game Engine: #unreal
Modeling: #blender
Demo headset: #oculusquest2
